p: It is also true that many people are not good at coping with exceptional cold either. But people can often protect themselves against the cold if they have the resources to do so. This may, to some degree, explain why we see higher levels of aggression and violence in northern parts of Russia ( Prudkov & Rodina, 2017). It also seems plausible that people in northern parts of Russia might migrate to more southern locations if they have the resources to do so (for a further discussion, see van Lange et al., 2017c).
